column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is associated to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 37 - Alert that is created when an eClipboard/ODM/ODT device tries to get a tooth chart image, but their eConn server is missing a specific redistributable that allows the creation of the image.
38 - Alert that is created when the SMSQueuer is turned on but no Broadcaster Servers are configured to send out text messages. Requires Engineers to update BroadcasterThreadSettings.

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 37 - Alert that is created when an eClipboard/ODM/ODT device tries to get a tooth chart image, but their eConn server is missing a specific redistributable that allows the creation of the image.
38 - Alert that is created when the SMSQueuer is turned on but no Broadcaster Servers are configured to send out text messages. Requires Engineers to update BroadcasterThreadSettings.

column.name: ApptNewPatThankYouSentNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ApptSecDateTEntry
column.summary: The Date and time of the original appointment.

column.name: DateTimeNewPatThankYouTransmit
column.summary: Generated by OD. Timestamp when EConnector sent this ApptNewPatThankYouSent to HQ. Stored in local customer timezone.

column.name: TypeCur
column.summary: Enum:ApptReminderType

Enumeration.name: ApptReminderType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 9 - NewPatientThankYou, Thank you for New Patient which is able to send with a new patient web form URL.

column.name: Autotrigger
column.summary: Enum:AutomationTrigger What triggers this automation

Enumeration.name: AutomationTrigger
Enumeration.EnumValue: Creating a new Claim
Opening an existing Claim

column.name: CompareField
column.summary: Enum:AutoCondField

column.name: CommBridge
column.summary: Enum:EclaimsCommBridge One of the included hard-coded communications bridges. Or none to just create the claim files without uploading.

Enumeration.name: EclaimsCommBridge
Enumeration.summary: Each clearinghouse can have a hard-coded comm bridge which handles all the communications of transfering the claim files to the clearinghouse/carrier. Does not just include X12, but can include any format at all.

column.name: CommSource
column.summary: Enum:CommItemSource Set to the source of the entity that created this commlog. E.g. WebSched.

column.name: ReferralNum
column.summary: FK to referral.ReferralNum.

column.name: CommReferralBehavior
column.summary: Enum:EnumCommReferralBehavior Changes how this referral commlog displays within grids.

column.name: CCSource
column.summary: Enum:CreditCardSource Indicates which application made this credit card and token.

Enumeration.name: CreditCardSource
Enumeration.EnumValue: 14 - EdgeExpress payment taken through the Payment Portal.
15 - EdgeExpress payment taken through the Payment Portal as a guest.
16 - PayConnect payment taken through the Payment Portal.
17 - PayConnect payment taken through the Payment Portal as a guest.
18 - PaySimple payment taken through the Payment Portal.
19 - PaySimple payment taken through the Payment Portal as a guest.
20 - PaySimple ACH Payment taken through the Payment Portal.
21 - XWeb payment taken through the Payment Portal.
22 - XWeb payment taken through the Payment Portal as a guest.

column.name: Nickname
column.summary: Nickname or alias. Currently only used in Web API for PaySimple.

column.name: Category
column.summary: Enum:DisplayFieldCategory If category is 0, then this is attached to a ChartView.

Enumeration.name: DisplayFieldCategory
Enumeration.EnumValue: 20 - Statement Limited Custom SuperFamily

column.name: DocMiscType
column.summary: Enum:DocumentMiscType Corresponds to the same subfolder within AtoZ folder. eg. UpdateFiles

Enumeration.name: DocumentMiscType
Enumeration.summary: More types will be added to correspond to most of the subfolders inside the AtoZ folder. But no point adding them until we implement.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 2- Entires of this doc type are segments of OpenDentalShareScreen.exe from our website. File names are formatted like version{guid}segment# (ex 12.11.2022.501{45e744a7-f6dd-4e55-9f9f-11d1f746eefe}13). An OpenDentalShareScreen.exe is complete when a record is present without a segment# (ex 12.11.2022.501{45e744a7-f6dd-4e55-9f9f-11d1f746eefe}).

column.name: CommBridge
column.summary: Enum:EclaimsCommBridge Where this Electronic ID came from. Will be 0 if created by the user. Currently, only ClaimConnect and EDS are supported.

Enumeration.name: EclaimsCommBridge
Enumeration.summary: Each clearinghouse can have a hard-coded comm bridge which handles all the communications of transfering the claim files to the clearinghouse/carrier. Does not just include X12, but can include any format at all.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0-No comm bridge will be activated. The claim files will be created to the specified path, but they will not be uploaded.
9 Canadian clearinghouse.
15 Canadian clearinghouse.
16 UK clearinghouse.
21 Canadian clearinghouse. Similar to ITRANS except supports certificate and carrier list web fetching.

column.name: Attributes
column.summary: Comma delimited list of which PayerAttributes of a CommBridge are supported by this Electronic ID. Example: "0,2,8". Enum values for either EnumClaimConnectPayerAttributes or EnumEDSPayerAttributes.

column.name: MsgType
column.summary: Enum:EmailMessageSource This is used to identify where in the program this message originated from. This is used for sent email messages.

Enumeration.name: EmailMessageSource
Enumeration.summary: The different parts in the program that send an email message.
Enumeration.EnumValue: New patient web form thank you message.

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 25 - Indicates that a payment was made from the Payment Portal.

column.name: ERoutingNum
column.summary: Primary Key.

column.name: Description
column.summary: Copied from ERoutingDef.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum. The patient this erouting is for.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. The clinic this patient erouting is in. Set to 0 if in headquarters or clinics are disabled.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: The DateTime this erouting was created. ERoutings are created when they are started. Not able to edited by the user.

column.name: IsComplete
column.summary: ERouting is considered complete if this is true. Used on backend to get incomplete eroutings without checking ERoutingActions

column.name: ERoutingActionNum
column.summary: Primary Key

column.name: ERoutingNum
column.summary: FK to erouting.ERoutingNum

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: Copied from eroutingActionDef.ItemOrder.

column.name: ERoutingActionType
column.summary: Enum:EnumERoutingActionType

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. This is the user that completed the action. If not complete, this will be 0.

column.name: IsComplete
column.summary: True if marked complete, otherwise set to false.

column.name: DateTimeComplete
column.summary: The date and time this action was set complete by the user.

column.name: ERoutingActionDefNum
column.summary: PK

column.name: ERoutingDefNum
column.summary: FK to eroutingdef.ERoutingDefNum. Defines what erouting this action is tied to

column.name: ERoutingActionType
column.summary: Enum:EnumERoutingActionType

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: Determines the order the items show in the patienteroutingactiondef and what order they are to be completed in.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: The date this action definition was created. Not able to edited by the user.

column.name: DateTLastModified
column.summary: The date time this action was last changed. Not able to be edited by the user.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. Represents the clinic that the erouting is tied to, if any. Can be 0.

column.name: Description
column.summary: The name of the erouting.

column.name: UserNumCreated
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user that created this erouting. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: UserNumModified
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user that last edited this erouting. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: SecDateTEntered
column.summary: Date Time this erouting was created. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: DateLastModified
column.summary: Date time this erouting was last edited. Cannot be edited by user.

column.name: ERoutingDefLinkNum
column.summary: PK

column.name: ERoutingDefNum
column.summary: FK to eroutingdef.ERoutingDefNum.

column.name: Fkey
column.summary: FK to other tables. Dictated by the FKey Type.

column.name: ERoutingType
column.summary: Enum:EnumERoutingType

Enumeration.name: EnumERoutingType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0. Equivalent to no ERoutingDefLink.
1. Can have an Fkey to AppointmentTypeNum.
2. Always an Fkey to DefNum for billing type.
3. Not currently in use.
4. Not currently in use.
5. Not currenlty in use.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 43 - Payment Portal UI.
44 - Payment Portal Api.
45 - EService Api.
46 - Auth Api.

column.name: Etype
column.summary: Enum:EtransType

Enumeration.name: EtransType
Enumeration.summary: The _CA of some types should get stripped off when displaying to users.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 34 Canada. Type 09.
35 Canada. Type 19.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions Some permissions will treat a zero FKey differently. Some denote it as having access to everything for that PermType. I.e. Reports.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 241 - Logs when web chat sessions are edited. For audit trails only.
242 - Allows users to access FormSuppliers
243 - Logs when any supply purchases are created, placed, or deleted.
244 - Only used at OD HQ. Ability to edit table rows via Broadcast Monitor.
245 - Allows users to resize appointments.
246 - Logs when a user pays with a credit card. For Audit Trails only.

column.name: PerVisitPatAmount
column.summary: The per visit patient copay amount. 0 by default. When an appt is scheduled or set complete, a new proc gets created with code specified in pref.PerVisitPatAmountProcCode.

column.name: PerVisitInsAmount
column.summary: The per visit amount to bill insurance. 0 by default. When an appt is scheduled or set complete, a new proc gets created with code specified in pref.PerVisitInsAmountProcCode.

column.name: MobileBrandingProfileNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: OfficeDescription
column.summary: The Clinic Name that will be shown on eClipboard CheckIn

column.name: LogoFilePath
column.summary: eConnector will fetch this file. Same path for every computer, so maybe use a network shared file. Shows as 90x90 pixels.

column.name: DateTStamp
column.summary: The time that this object was last modified or inserted. Automatically updated by MySQL every time a row is added or changed. Used to determine if eClipboard needs to fetch an updated mobile branding profile.
